<h3 id="X35857">X(35857) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES TO INNER-GARCIA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^6-(b+c)*a^5-(2*b^2-7*b*c+2*c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a^3+(b^4+c^4-5*(b-c)^2*b*c)*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*b*c+2*(a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*S*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a)  :  :
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(40)</p>
<p>X(35857) lies on these lines:
{3,35882}, {6,12773}, {11,6564}, {80,6502}, {100,6396}, {104,371}, {119,10577}, {149,6560}, {153,486}, {372,952}, {515,35853}, {615,11698}, {1152,12331}, {1317,35809}, {1484,3070}, {1703,7993}, {1768,35775}, {2771,7968}, {2783,35879}, {2787,35825}, {2800,35642}, {2802,35611}, {2806,35829}, {2829,35821}, {2831,35881}, {5414,7972}, {5533,35802}, {6264,35774}, {6265,35762}, {6420,19081}, {6561,12248}, {6565,10742}, {8068,35800}, {8674,35827}, {8960,20418}, {9913,35777}, {10058,35808}, {10074,35768}, {10698,35811}, {10738,35820}, {10778,35834}, {11715,35763}, {12138,35765}, {12199,35767}, {12332,35773}, {12462,35781}, {12463,35779}, {12499,35783}, {12515,35610}, {12619,35788}, {12737,35641}, {12751,35789}, {12752,35791}, {12753,35795}, {12754,35793}, {12761,35797}, {12762,35799}, {12763,35801}, {12764,35803}, {12765,35807}, {12766,35805}, {12775,35817}, {12776,35819}, {13913,35815}, {13977,35813}, {19082,35771}, {19914,35842}, {22775,35785}, {22799,35787}</p>
<p>
X(35857) = reflection of X(35883) in X(372)<br>
X(35857) = {X(6), X(12773)}-harmonic conjugate of X(35856)<br>
</p>
